messages.title: We need someone to stand up for our environment in government
messages.content: While others have stood on the sidelines saying green things, the Liberal Democrats have been in government doing them...

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Saving our forests from privatisation and planting a million more trees
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Saving our forests from privatisation and planting a million more trees

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Founding the world's first Green Investment Bank creating 250,000 low carbon jobs by 2020
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Founding the world's first Green Investment Bank creating 250,000 low carbon jobs by 2020

issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats are committed to fighting for 5 new laws to protect and improve our environment. Promoting green transport. Raising energy efficiency. Targets to reduce waste. Decarbonisation targets for energy.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

endorsements.endorsement: Here's what the Green Alliance, which includes Greenpeace, Friends of the Earth, the RSPB, and others say about the Liberal Democrats... Liberal Democrats have won some significant battles on climate change.
